# onyourmark

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

onyourmark is a package for setting up projects the way I like to set up projects. It's just a bunch of wrappers around usethis functions to make my life easier.

## Installation

You can install the development version of onyourmark like so:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("MarkPaulin/onyourmark")
```
